revised_title: Investigation of the Spectrum of Magnesium and Magnesium Hydride in Spark Discharges under Reduced Pressure
tldr: The authors study the spectrum of magnesium and the so-called magnesium hydride under reduced pressure using spark discharges. They discover that the hydride spectrum is highly complex and always present in great intensity when hydrogen is present. The high-frequency flame discharge provides a brilliant spectrum that differs from the spark and arc spectra.
